item.title: Connecting Raspberry-Pi to Laptop Without HDMI or Ethernet Cable
item.description:
While doing a college project, I had to use the Raspberry-Pi for the first time and needed to connect it with the laptop without a cable. As I remember, it required some troubleshooting.

https://www.instructables.com/Connecting-Raspberry-Pi-to-Laptop-Without-HDMI-or-/

item.title: XSS bypassing ModSecurity WAF
item.description:
Found an XSS payload that bypassed the ModSecurity coreruleset.

It is fixed now.

https://github.com/coreruleset/coreruleset/issues/3381
item.content:
